meanings.sent1: The precontact era was a time before people met.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists discovered precontact artifacts in the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The precontact customs seemed strange to the modern visitors.
meanings.sent4: The precontact landscape remained untouched by human hands.
meanings.sent5: The precontact history of the tribe was shrouded in mystery.

meanings.definition: Existing or happening before communication or interaction.
meanings.sent1: The precontact language was not understood by the newcomers.
meanings.sent2: The precontact trade routes were vital for the ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The precontact agreement was lost in translation.
meanings.sent4: The precontact silence between the two groups was deafening.
meanings.sent5: The precontact relationship between the kingdoms was fragile.
